definition: The term refers to the quality or characteristic of being sharp, particularly in relation to objects or sensations. It is commonly used to describe the sharpness of a blade, tool, or object, as well as the intensity or strength of a taste, flavor, or sensation.

examples.german: Die Schärfe des Messers ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The sharpness of the knife is impressive.

examples.german: Ich mag die Schärfe von Chili.
examples.english: I like the spiciness of chili.

examples.german: Die Schärfe des Bildes lässt zu wünschen übrig.
examples.english: The sharpness of the image leaves something to be desired.

examples.german: Er hat die Schärfe seines Verstandes verloren.
examples.english: He has lost the sharpness of his mind.

examples.german: Die Schärfe des Kontrasts ist atemberaubend.
examples.english: The sharpness of the contrast is breathtaking.
